name: Discover Erasure
description:
Discover Erasure is a love letter to educational software for home computers of long-ago, started as practice for working with 3D assets and development using the Godot engine. View fictional planetary bodies and moons in three dimensions and learn facts about the Erasure system, (where implemented !)

Download using the links below.

Discover Erasure is in development and currently has missing features. Anyone interested with participating in its development is invited to view and download specially prepared maps where names of mountains, craters, and other surface features are incomplete or not implemented. View the image set here.

If you'd like to ask questions, submit typos or just say hello, please check out my Twitter. I can also accept submissions for feature names there as well.
